Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Muñoz López Díaz at a golf tournament in Madrid. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 31 years, Muñoz López Díaz has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Muñoz López Díaz and Beatriz have been married since 1999. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Muñoz completed his secondary education at IES José Manuel Blecua Pamplona in 1989.
Muñoz finished his studies at University of the Basque Country in 1993.
Occupation History:
Muñoz López Díaz is a seasoned professional with over 31 years of experience.
In 1994, Muñoz López Díaz started working as a Research Scientist at PharmaMar S.A., marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 1996, he moved to Zeltia S.A. to work as a Biotech Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 420000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 1980000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 6530000 EUR from his mother, a respected Venture Capitalist, in 2014, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Muñoz has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
